sentences.sContent: Nothing is more fatal to happiness than the remembrance of happiness. ——–Andre Gide.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nothing is more fatal to happiness than the remembrance of happiness. ——–Andre Gide.
sentences.sCn: 没有什么比回忆幸福更令人痛苦的了。 ——安德鲁。纪德。

synos.tran: 回想，回忆；纪念品；记忆力

remMethod.val: 来自remember (v. 回忆起； 纪念)

trans.tranOther: a memory that you have of a person or event
